name: location_search
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool foreca_weather.
Tool description: Everything you need to build a weather app
API description: Search for locations by name using the Foreca Weather API.

query.description: The name of the location to search for.

lang.description: The language for the results. Defaults to 'en'.

country.description: The country code to filter the search results. Defaults to 'in'.
